User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Performance hints for search engines
Crawl-delay: 1

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://mappamundi.us/sitemap.xml

# Disallow unnecessary files
Disallow: /_site/
Disallow: /_layouts/
Disallow: /_includes/
Disallow: /_sass/
Disallow: /assets/images/original/
Disallow: /Gemfile*
Disallow: /package*.json
Disallow: /node_modules/
Disallow: /update_bootstrap.sh
Disallow: /optimize-images.sh
